reviews.review_text: Tried one of each of the 8 different oysters that were available. They were all so good although I was gravitating towards the briny ones. Sean executed them well on the plate by placing them in the order as the menu so we d know which variety we were eating. The fresh prawn cocktail were huge and meaty and the fried oyster were so crunchy and delicious. Fries were perfectly crunchy. I love the cozy environment and the window seat is great for eating and people watching. I will definitely be back.  Highly recommend.
Such a great little spot. The staff is super friendly and knowledgeable and the oysters are super fresh. Always a great selection and the space is a great vibe!

Came here for the oysters and it didnt disappoint. We had the special oyster of the day which was discounted to $2.50 each. It came with the full complement of different toppings to accompany the oysters. Needless to say we couldnt stop at only 1 dozen..
Delicious & fresh oysters. Lovely little shop that specializes in oysters and does it so well. Knowledgeable and sweet staff. The small space aids in the charm so I recommend making a rezo.

Coziest little oyster bar ever! I dont know if it seats more than a dozen people, but I am glad I was one of them last week. Top class fresh oysters, usually 6-7 varieties to choose from. The raw shucked are outstanding - the shucker is a master. We had 2 dozen raw and each was a work of shucking art - each oyster perfectly separated from its shell, undamaged in any way. And with the liquor intact. That is some skill. Hats off! Oh, and the homemade chili-vodka condiment? Inspired! The fried oysters were big meaty west coasters, perfectly crispy, juicy. I want to go back with a bigger group, so we can try them all. Big thanks to the owners - such nice people

Always love visiting here. Has such quiet charm and the oysters are always delicious. On my visit they were offering 5 different types of Oyster. My favorite was the Sannich Bay Oyster. But all were tasty.

If youre in Chinatown and crave oysters THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO. Ive been here a number of times over the last 5 years and havent been disappointed. The oysters are fresh and service is genuine. They usually have a handful of different types and can describe them to you. Fresh shucked in the restaurant. Plated on a bed of ice with grated horseradish. Cocktail sauce, Mignonette sauce, chili water served along side. They have happy hour!!
The oysters were so fresh, tasty and smell of the sea. All the food we ordered was excellent and enjoyed by all. Small menu means the quality is excellent.

Fresh & delicious oysters!! Can t compare with other oyster restaurants for this quality and service! Oyster shucking skill is one of the best I ever seen at the restaurant - clean & not damaging oyster meat. Highly recommend!
Wonderful! Came for a quick hh before dinner and had the hh oysters. No frills spot (think dive bar) with great service and delicious fresh ones.

A hidden gem! Great option for a spur-of-the-moment, very casual dining experience. The pair that runs it are great: theyre personable & enthusiastic about oysters. Everything is always fresh & portion sizes are good. Fairly simple menu but I mainly go for the oysters anyways! Always tempted to stop by when Im in the neighborhood or passing by :)

DAMMM!!!! I finally came here and love the happy hour!  I got two dozen fresh oysters, fries, and I especially love the deep fried oysters!!!   Cool place to chill and have a alcoholic beverage, or a 100!!!

Their oysters are always so fresh and plump! Love the $1.50 happy hour deal pre-covid, now post-covid dine-in at $2. Had nanoose bay and pink pearl today. The pink pearls were HUGE - fresh, plump, sweet, and a great deal even outside the daily happy hour price. The staff is knowledgeable and they rotate the daily oysters so you get to try different kinds on different days. Their sides are also yummy, especially yam fries. They pair so well with oysters. My go-to spot for oysters in Vancouver 10/10!
The best place for oysters... The seafood Argentinian shrimps are amazing, the best chicken wings my favorite its delicious  .... Fine dining Best service I highly recommend come

Weve been coming to Oyster Express for over 10 years. It is by far my favorite place for oysters - other establishments cannot compare to Oyster Expresss freshness and selection, not to mention the care the owners put into their craft. The restaurant is small and intimate and is run by a really lovely couple (Shawn and Soran). They always provide stellar service and are very genuine for the support their customers provide them. Weve always had a great time! Continue the great work!

5 . Five ! Five stars ! What a delightful little not so hole in the wall on the wrong side of town place. On the edge of china town which would seem like the middle of no where, then you walk in  woot woot woot oyster heaven , served up by a duo shucker and server, fried oysters were crispy and yet so juicy and the half shell selection was delightful fresh and came with the expected accoutrements. For a little hole in the wall Oyster bar on the edge of town. Chinatown. I didn t want to leave. Fresh beer and an interesting take on the bubbly. Love this place.
This is an extraordinary little  place full of energy and good vibe. A nice variety of oysters in the heart of China town. The staff is so friendly. It is a nice stop in the area

Oysters were very fresh and clean with comfortable environment! Good place to talk with your bestie. Me and my friend went there yesterday and each of us ate approximately 20! We ordered white wine as well, perfect match! They also offered few sauces for your own table that you can choose. Price is reasonable and good service! I left my key on Sunday and unfortunately they closed on Monday. I was so frustrated the whole night. I tried to massaged them through google map which I won t expect to receive prompt responses. However, The owner (I think he is the owner) replied my massaged the next day morning, and he was so nice and helpful, he went back to the restaurant to pass me the key on the day suppose to be closed. It was a great experience, so I bought two drinks for him and his wife as a gift for doing all this. Hahahahahha highly recommend that you to go there! Try the fresh and affordable fresh oyster!

Take out only for now. Extremely well packed, fresh and delicious oysters, reasonable prices (around $2-4 per), highly recommend! They pack their oysters in a plastic take out container, already shucked. Top of the oyster shell still there to cover the oyster for freshness. Oysters sat on top of a pack of ice in Ziploc bag. Condiments and lemons included as well. Must try if you like oysters and youre in the Chinatown area!!
Amazing spot! Oyster Varieties galore! Best prawn cocktail and a great room.
Freshest and cleanest oysters Ive had     Warm and attentive service    Was able to fit our baby stroller during down time. Highly recommend this hidden gem!
Amazing, we ordered 3 dozen oysters shucked to go.. and he politely obliged.. took great care of us and then we went down to beach and ate them all. Thank you so much! Love the Effinghams!!
Loved this place. Great service down to how well the oysters are shucked. Great happy hour specials.

Love the raspberry oysters so much. The house made vodka with pickled chilli sauce match great with the oysters yet wont cover the original salty and ocean flavour of the oysters. Wild catch prawns cocktails was amazing too. Mild sweetness which stay for a long time in your month. Also the bouncy and soft texture is different from the others prawns I had.
Delicious and fresh oysters, shucked to order. Small bar with a relaxing atmosphere.
Easially the most lit oyster experience you can ask for. They have an assortment of lit oysters, the sauces are on fire. The flavors are memorable.
Family owned oyster bar . The place is small in chinatoen . The couple has run the business for 10 years , a lovely couple . The oysters are very fresh , will definitely recommend friends here .
Great place run by a couple who are clearly passionate about their restaurant. The menu is small but thats almost a good thing, because everything on it is excellent. Highly recommended!
Great little oyster spot. Chef really knows how to shuck. $1.50 special is a great deal. Usually a very good selection of oysters from both coasts. A gem. One of my Vancouver favorites.
Great oysters and value during their happy hour. Love the location and the feel inside. Good selection and good at what they do. Always a great place to start before dinner out.
Fresh oysters, good varieties and service. We came for happy hour this time and have 30 oysters for 2 people.  $1.5 each medium size Pink Pearl Oyster ~ totally satisfied!!
super fresh delicious oysters.  we had Kussui  oysters and Gorge Inlet oysters.  Both kinds of oysters are great to eat.  Come and enjoy the oysters.

Cozy little place but what else do you need in a oyster bar.  Aside from the specials which are quite satisfactory nonetheless, I do recommend trying some oysters from other places since they are usually not available elsewhere.
Friendly service, fresh oysters with variety source locally and from east coast. Note they mainly serve oysters and not much else but beer and some pub food.
Very cute place with a lot of choices for oysters. The service was great and food was amazing as well
Fresh oysters, shuck to order, friendly staff, different menu for oysters. IMO, West coast oysters are tastier. Go during happy hour 5-7pm
Amazing place with incredible owners. If you want the best oysters in Vancouver this is the place to be. Master shucker !! Drool worthy hot food especially the wings.
Phenomenal oysters and great vibes, will be back again soon!

Enjoyed 2 dozen oysters of 4 varieties, all were fresh and expertly shucked. The white wines were amazing, I sampled 3 varieties and all were excellent choices that would please many pallets. For those not into raw oysters, the fried oysters, soy chicken wings and fries were all hot, crispy and well seasoned! Already planning a trip back with girlfriends :)

We love this little hidden gem in Chinatown, near Science World. The fried oysters are to die for, and the mussels are great too! We were going quite regularly before Covid and have been doing takeout since. The quality of the food is always amazing, and the owner is super friendly and welcoming. Definitely one of my go-tos in the city and a must-try!
Excellent fresh oysters and welcoming service. Well done.

Best Oyster place in BC. -The best condiments (the flavored vodka is amazing) -The best service, its only a 2 people business, husband & wife, and you can tell they are so passionate about everything they are doing. -Prices are amazing, lower than other oyster places and most other restaurants, oysters or not. -Small memu, but EVERYTHING is absolutely delicious If you love oysters in any way, do yourself a favor and come here. PS: Excellent spot to bring your date, haha.

Friendly and intimate place for tasty and fresh oysters! Happy hour(s) a must. My wife and I tried both raw and fried and were thoroughly impressed. The yam fries also went down well. I really can t fault this place!
Amazing hidden gem. One of the few spots in town for top tier oysters shucked perfectly. May have had my favourite oyster of all time
Omg, I ended up ordering 40+ pieces of oysters. I have to save up some to come here, can t resist their amazing oysters. Sand dune was amazing!!!! Oh, don t forget to try fried oysters too!!
Friendly staff, nice place with a wholesome environment. The oysters are also quite good. Food
Great server, very fresh and properly shucked oysters. Hot pepper infused vodka on the table! Wow.
Fresh plump oyster! Highly recommend.
Great service and most of all super fresh oysters. We will definitely be back again and again- if only we live in Vancouver! This place is a gem.

Oyster expert. In the time I was here I watched three groups sit down, look at the menu, and say they were hoping for more options. They re missing the point. This place is giving you exactly what they promise: amazing oysters.
This is my go to for fresh delicious oysters for many years. The quality shows as the owner handpicked each one  ... excellent service and we like its cozy ambient too.

Cozy and delicious.  The menu is not very expansive, but what they do, they do well.  They serve great Asian style chicken wings and a fabulous grilled cheese for those who are not oyster lovers.  Friendly, knowledgeable staff.  I am not a fan of oysters, yet I eat there at least once a month.  Well worth a visit.

My fiancee and I went there last night for the first time and had a great time! We like oysters but dont really know too much about them so we were really in their hands. Shawn and his team definitely had us covered. They took their time with us, really explaining the differences and recommending oyster pairings. The wealth of knowledge that they have and share is incredible. It really feels like youre getting a tailor made made experience in a warm, cozy and friendly place. The selection of oysters is great too, with lots of varieties to choose from from both the east and west coast. The cherry on top...they played Al Green in the background. We will definitely be going back and would highly recommend this place to anyone, whether youre an oyster officianardo or novice.

WOOT! Cheap oysters, beer and close to Downtown? I am totally in! Came here after work with a close friend and had a beer with fresh oysters. The place used to be a Chinese Bookstore, and sold random Asian junk from time to time and it was a DVD store after that. The place has been renovated into a brand new restaurant with new wood inside, keeping it simple and a great layout. The oysters that are served here change daily, from what I heard. We ordered 4 dozen of daily oysters and finished it all in an hour. The shucking skills of the chef are amazing, because I didnt find a chipped shell in my oysters. The waiter that was serving us is a cutie too. He was easy on the eyes and had a British accent. He was attentive and very kind to us. Enjoyed his companion for a while :)
One word Oyster! Fresh, good, price good, small friendly restaurant.
Great quality and nice selection of oysters on the half shell, friendly efficient service, warm atmosphere: I would certainly recommend.
Delicious fresh oysters. We came for happy hour and got a great deal on oysters of the day at 1.95 a piece. Maybe the best oysters Ive ever had. Quaint, and friendly service. Cant wait to come back!

Im very new to the oyster world, so a friend took me here to sample some different varieties. The waiter described the origin and flavour of a few oysters and made some recommendations. They also had daily specials, which were quite reasonable. Theyre fully licensed as well - we had a couple beers Parking can be a challenge. The area is fairly dense and its mostly metered parking, or some pay lots nearer to Main St.

We ordered 12 of the pink pearl and the 12 of the raspberry and the quality was excellent.  We ordered for take out and it came in two take out containers with separate containers for horse radish, seafood sauce, and vinegar (I believe).  This final price was a little pricy $69.30 but overall it was worth it.
This place is amazing!! So worth the wait. The oysters taste fresh and amazing. The happy hour of the best Ive ever gone too. Definitely have to check it out!

Only been here once but the wait staff was great, helpful in decoding the oyster selection, service was good. The oysters were super tasty. And I guess the only review that matters when reviewing an oyster bar is, no one got sick... We had no problem finding a seat during happy hour and they oyster special was our favourite.
Wonderful staff, delicious oysters, amazing ambience. The $1.50 happy hour is a great deal, but the other oysters are well worth trying as well. Plan on becoming a regular.
Fresh oysters at a decent price. Lots of selections and friendly staff.  One daily special each day.  Nice cozy atmosphere. Good place to hangout and bring guests from out of town.

Chinatowns best kept secret. This little hole in the wall offers the best, most fresh oysters in the city. Friendly to those who are not very knowledgeable of oysters - staff has all the info you need. Also, menu ever-changes, so be sure to look at the board for pointers.
Delicious mix of oysters served by a fun team
This place has the best oysters in town with great service. Expect some wait during happy hours if you like to order in small batches but otherwise this is the oyster shack you want to eat at.

Best fresh oysters in town with great selection and shucking skills! Love raw oysters?! This is the place to go!!!  Great service! Fresh! Yummy!!! My favourite oyster bar!! Clam chowder is soooo Good!!! Must order!!!
Love this place. Best oyster selection and shucking in the city. Hands down. Great price, great quality.  Also the wine list is phenomenal. Staff is great too!  Hidden gem.

Yes yes yes! Amazing prices for delicious oysters! Im abit of an oyster connoisseur,  eaten them all over the world and this is a great valueand fun for friends. Dont worry about the location,  its a must visit.
Amazing jewel oyster restaurant in the middle of Chinatown. Well worth the visit especially during happy hour. Fresh high quality oysters, good selection of draft beers, well trained stuff.
Very good, fresh oysters! knowledgeable waitress! Went for their happy hours! Quality and price so much better then Yaletown Rodney oysters!
My favourite spot for oysters. Great food, good price and friendly staff. Oysters are always fresh. I really like their chicken wings.
Fantastic oyster house! Super fresh and awesome value! hard working  owner and the staff are extremely nice. One of my favourites in Vancouver. a definite Gem!
Great food and service as usual! Fresh, perfectly prepared oysters and succulent chicken wings. Paired with a nice white wine.

I first came here was in 2014, recently I came back to Canada living and I cant believe the oyster bar is still here, food, quality, friendly and everything is  awesome, I will keep to support this bar.

My favourite place for raw oysters in Vancouver.  The owner is very passionate about oysters and maintains a large and constantly varying selection.  Great place to hang out, drink, and slurp back very fresh oysters.
Great oysters without the pretentious vibe (hard to find in Vancouver). Great happy hour. Super friendly and accommodating.
The quality of the oysters was fantastic!

Tucked away at an inconspicuous corner at the edge of Chinatown, this homely little haunt is an oyster aficionados heaven. When we visited, the board boasted 10 types of oysters, featuring a wide selection of oysters harvested locally, on the east coast ( from Prince Edward Island) to even overseas. The oysters are lovingly served with a side of fresh horseradish, lemon and an assortment of homemade and bottled sauces. Star of the night were the Kaipara flown in overnight from New Zealand, simply sublime. The steamed muscles were sizeable, steeped in a rich creamy broth complemented by fresh onions that added some crunch to the taste. Perhaps the only disappointment was the freshly shuckled live sea scallop from Qualicum, BC. At $7 a pop I was expecting fireworks, but the taste was slightly underwhelming.
Nice service, no fragments or silt in the oysters at all, fresh, delicious, and fairly priced. Well worth it to come here!
I m obsessed!!
Hands down my favourite oyster joint. Hole in the wall with SO MUCH GOODNESS. Great service, solid music, quality oysters and great prices!
If you love fresh oysters this place never disappoints.
Lots of oyster options! Happy hour is worth it!!! Good service! Love the raw oyster, steamed mussels and prawn cocktails!!!!
Fresh and delicious oysters came prepared to eat. Great experience ordering on the phone and reliable delivery.
I was so happy to eat oyster here. So fresh and sweet. We couldnt help but slurped down a dozen in just a few minute!! Well be back for sure!
My favourite food place as of 2 weeks ago. Can t believe I ve never been there before. Really good fresh oysters and more.
One of my fav spots in Chinatown area !! Oysters are great deal and tasty.  Wonderful staff, delicious oysters, amazing ambience.
Gorgeous little spot. Great happy-hour specials. Wonderfully friendly and patient staff. Happy hour gets packed, so, avoid it or be early. Stay for a few hours, its cozy.
The best oysters in Vancouver by far! Great selection of oysters, awesome local beers, and the best happy hour around (5-7PM daily)!
Incredible experience. I highly recommend Oyster Express if you just want the good stuff. Oysters, drinks, and an amazing setting.
Great variety of fresh tasty oysters, knowledgeable pleasant staff.
If you want great oysters without little pieces of shell in them like most other places, this is it!
Delicious oysters during happy hour. Cocktail sauce is the best. Will definitely come back!
Fantastic oysters. Great service. You really cant ask for more in a place. Cozy and welcoming.
Oyster Express is where I take visiting friends and myself when I need a treat. Perfect oysters! Attentive and knowledgeable servers.
Really great oysters, wings and chowder. Highly recommend. Will order again soon!
Small little place, great oysters :) Friendly service and good wine selection.
Excellent quality oysters and service alike. Area may be a little sketchy for some people though.
Amazing place, great service well priced oysters and friendly staff. Great Value!!
